scripts.build: npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 lerna run build
scripts.clean: npm run tsc.clean && npx lerna clean -y && npx shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.docs.build: shx cp -r src/packages/ganache/dist/web/* docs/assets/js/ganache && lerna run docs.build && ts-node scripts/build-docs/
scripts.postinstall: lerna bootstrap && ts-node scripts/link-ts-references.ts && npm run tsc && ts-node scripts/postinstall
scripts.release: npm run tsc.clean && npm run tsc && npm test && npm run build && lerna publish --yes --canary --no-git-reset --preid canary --dist-tag canary --force-publish --exact && npm run docs.build
scripts.start: lerna exec --loglevel=silent --scope ganache -- npm run start --silent --
scripts.tsc.clean: npx lerna exec -- npx shx rm -rf lib dist typings
